fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - Course Catalog by Category
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to aggregate courses by category and present in a visualization showing distribution.

InputDefinition.userMessage: Create a chart showing how many courses we offer in each category. I'd like to click on a category to see all the courses in it.

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes a chart (bar or pie chart) showing course counts by category
Chart is properly labeled with category names and counts
Visual presentation makes it easy to compare categories
Chart supports drill-down to show course list for selected category
Course table allows opening individual course records
